summary: This document outlines the designation and acceptance of successor trustees for the Butterfly Trust, originally established on December 27, 2006. It includes the resignations of Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn as trustees, and the acceptance of Erika A. Kellerhals and Harry I. Beller as successor trustees.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is one of the original trustees of the Butterfly Trust and resigns from his position in this document.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is another original trustee of the Butterfly Trust who also resigns from his position in this document.

persons.name: Erika A. Kellerhals
persons.context: Erika A. Kellerhals is designated as a successor trustee of the Butterfly Trust and accepts this designation in the document.

persons.name: Harry I. Beller
persons.context: Harry I. Beller is also designated as a successor trustee of the Butterfly Trust and accepts this designation.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is acknowledged in the document as having received the resignations and designations of the trustees.

connections.description: Both Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn serve as original trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Darren K. Indyke designates Erika A. Kellerhals as a successor trustee of the Butterfly Trust.
Richard Kahn designates Erika A. Kellerhals as a successor trustee of the Butterfly Trust.
Darren K. Indyke designates Harry I. Beller as a successor trustee of the Butterfly Trust.
Richard Kahn designates Harry I. Beller as a successor trustee of the Butterfly Trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein acknowledges the resignations and designations made by Darren K. Indyke.
Jeffrey E. Epstein acknowledges the resignations and designations made by Richard Kahn.

events.title: Resignation of Trustees
events.description: Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn resign as trustees of the Butterfly Trust.

events.title: Designation of Successor Trustees
events.description: Erika A. Kellerhals and Harry I. Beller are designated as successor trustees of the Butterfly Trust.

keyFacts: Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn resign as trustees of the Butterfly Trust on October 31, 2014.
Erika A. Kellerhals and Harry I. Beller are designated as successor trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
The trust agreement for the Butterfly Trust was originally created on December 27, 2006.
Jeffrey E. Epstein acknowledges the resignations and designations of the trustees.
